name: auth_rls_initplan
title: Auth RLS Initialization Plan - FIXED
description: Previously detected policies where auth.uid() was being unnecessarily re-evaluated for each row. This issue has been resolved.
detail: All RLS policies now use (select auth.uid()) to evaluate the function once per query rather than once per row.
cache_key: auth_rls_init_plan_public_users_Users can view their own profile
notes: Fixed by replacing auth.uid() with (select auth.uid()) in all RLS policies. See fix-performance-issues.sql for details.

name: multiple_permissive_policies
title: Multiple Permissive Policies - FIXED
description: Previously detected multiple permissive policies on the same table for the same role and action. This issue has been resolved.
detail: Multiple permissive policies have been consolidated into single policies to avoid performance degradation.
notes: Fixed by consolidating multiple permissive policies into single policies. See fix-performance-issues.sql for details.
